i sometimes drive fast.

participant_2.background:
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.
My rap playlist is my favorite because it reminds me of the struggles I faced and how far I've come.
i write.
I love chocolate, but I can't eat it as much as I want because my dog loves it too.
I prefer a nice glass of wine with my cheese platter.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just working on some writing.
Nice! I\'m an engineer and I\'m working on a sustainable solution for the environment.
That\'s awesome! I\'m trying to be more environmentally conscious myself, but I\'m not doing a great job.
Oh, well you can always start by recycling and composting!
I do recycle, but I\'m not sure what composting is.
Oh, composting is when you collect food scraps and other organic matter and put it in a special container so it can decompose and turn into fertilizer.
Oh, that sounds like a good idea! I\'ll have to look into that.
You should! It\'s really easy and it\'s good for the environment.
No problem! What kind of writing are you working on?
Oh, that sounds fun! What\'s it about?
It\'s about a woman who\'s unlucky in love and she meets a guy who\'s everything she\'s ever wanted.
Thanks! I\'m hoping it\'s a good one.
I\'m sure it will be! You\'re a good writer.
